column4: Is there some way to save all my preferences, like shortcuts I have created by myself, the bar I had customized etc ?
all the preferences are contained in the .* folders in your home directory
thanks :)  i guess there is no way that I can backup all the installed programs I have, right?
you can backup the ubuntu partition with partimage, or simply download the "System Rescue CD"
once i have partimage, i format my disk and then what ?
you can't use partimage while being in the system. Boot of the Rescue CD, and it will make an image of your partition
